 Magnus turned with sudden alert. His dl of the oracal allowed him long range 
scanners. He picked up a fleet of preds heading towards the new pred base. He 
knew one of the pred signatures was megatrons. He knew this was not good. He 
yelled to destructor..."Hey are you guys in leauge with megatron.."
  Destructor answered.."No he is our most ruthless enimie."
 "Well then I suggest you get your men and some of the maximals to help you. 
Cuz he is headed right at your base." Destructor's eyes widened.."No!!" he 
flew off to the base opening his comm on the way to grimmler ramulus and kit 
kat.."Preds are headed to my base,. I need you two maximals to help it will 
be lost. Kit kat megatron is on his way. Be ready"
